abstract: Not only did Fox trounce the competition in the ratings with “American Idol,” at 9 p.m., but it also finished first during the 8 p.m. hour with the season finale of “The Moment of Truth” (10 million). The marriage-busting show has enjoyed the highest ratings among adults 18 to 49 of any new show this season.
lead_paragraph: Not only did Fox trounce the competition in the ratings with “American Idol,” at 9 p.m., but it also finished first during the 8 p.m. hour with the season finale of “The Moment of Truth” (10 million). The marriage-busting show has enjoyed the highest ratings among adults 18 to 49 of any new show this season.

headline.main: Would You Go On ‘Moment of Truth’?
